data.title: Letter from David Anderson concerning Patrick Adamson
data.meta_description:
Autograph letter signed, David Anderson to a person unknown.


The recipient is addressed only as "Sir". The letter is described by the author as being on the "education, learning and lyfe" of Patrick Adamson, archbishop of St Andrews, and gives an outline of P.A.â€™s ecclesiastical career, his relations with the earl of Morton, regent of Scotland [Archibald Douglas, earl of Angus, 6th earl of Morton], an attempt on his life on the St Andrews golf links [Fife], his time in England, at Windsor [Berkshire], with an extended digression on the consequences to the Scottish Church of the recent reforms.
Signed David Anderson.
20 November 1590.
data.text:
Help make our records better
